title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the File Type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the File Type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
1) Open an existing Java file. 
2) Modify the file (e.g., move an existing class).
3) Click the SaveAs icon, next to the Save Icon. A dialog will appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location.
5) Type the filename but ignore the extension, as it is not requested.
6) Click Ok.

Observed Behavior: The file is added to the specified location in the Navigator, but no file extension is shown.
EB:
The file is treated as a generic file, and when opening it, it is displayed as plain text. 

Expected Behavior: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file, unless explicitly changed.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1) Open an existing Java file.
2) Modify the file.
3) Click the SaveAs icon next to the Save Icon.
4) Browse for a valid container location.
5) Type the filename without the extension.
6) Click Ok.
